original_text: The king also made a great ivory throne and overlaid it with pure gold.
korean_text: 왕이 또 상아로 큰 보좌를 만들고 순금으로 입혔으니

sentences.original_text: The king also made a great ivory throne
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 또한 큰 상아 옥좌를 만들었다

sentences.original_text: and overlaid it with pure gold
